definition: Lugu Lake
old name of a river in Jiangxi/place name
abbr. for Tianjin 天津 (also 津沽)
to buy/to sell
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]

sentences.english: Lugu Lake is located in the north of Yun Nan province.
sentences.chinese: 瀘沽湖在雲南和四川交界處。

sentences.english: As the plan, our tour guide lead us to go to the Lugu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 根據行程安排，我們的導遊會帶我們去瀘沽湖。

sentences.english: Lake Lugu, or "Xienami" in local dialect, is actually referring to Muhai, which means the sea of mother.
sentences.chinese: 瀘沽湖，當地人稱“謝納咪”，即母海的意思。

sentences.english: Plunged into the embrace of Lugu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 沉迷在瀘沽湖的懷抱裏。

sentences.english: Lugu Lake, located in Yunnan Province, is 300 kilometers away from Lijiang County.
sentences.chinese: 瀘沽湖位於雲南境內，距離麗江300公里。

sentences.english: A generation ago, few outsiders had ever heard of Lake Lugu or the Mosuo.
sentences.chinese: 在上一代，少有外地人聽說過瀘沽湖或摩梭族。

definition: Namtso or Lake Nam (officially Nam Co), mountain lake at Nakchu in central Tibet

Tiger Leaping Gorge on the Jinsha River 金沙江[Jin1 sha1 jiang1] in Lijiang Naxi autonomous county 麗江納西族自治縣|丽江纳西族自治县[Li4 jiang1 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4], Yunnan
Yangshuo county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
Lhasa, capital city of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
Sêrtar county (Tibetan: gser thar rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Bali (island in Indonesia)
Jiuzhaigou Valley, Sichuan/Jiuzhaigou county, Sichuan
Gonggar county, Tibetan: Gong dkar rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); a fleeting glance in passing/fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
